title: Fed Frets About Shadow Banks and Eyes Treasury Liquidity in New Report
description: The Federal Reserve is watching the government bond market and investment funds as rate increases ricochet through finance.
dc:creator: Jeanna Smialek and Joe Rennison
media:credit: Sarah Silbiger for The New York Times
media:description: The Federal Reserve building in Washington. As policymakers remain determined to push ahead with efforts to slow the economy, they are keeping a careful eye on market conditions.
